name: Consult a doctor
description: The patient facing Android application to the Eclinic247 platform
roleDescription:
Well architectured, stable, reusable, scalable and maintainable application.

Model View ViewModel architectural pattern

Event Buses from Reactive Java for inter class communication.
Code practises based on design patterns for maximum code structure, reusability and maintainability.

Latest Android SDK capabilities like data binding for code cleanliness.

name: Grow your practise
description: The doctor facing Android application to the Eclinic247 platform
roleDescription:
Application made from the reusable skeletal structure which the patient application inherits as well.

Common utility and resources between the applications for easy maintenance of the repository.

name: Cherrywork
description: A Mobility solution for Enterprise Resource Planning
roleDescription:
Design of applications that simplifies the actions required to handle the various scenarios an enterprise requires.

Development of applications that can be reusable so as to be able to be repurposed and integrated into a larger platform.

Independent applications making context aware decisions.

name: Recapo
description: Prototypical implementation of an Android application that can perform Reverse Card Sorting experiment
roleDescription:
An application that constructs itself based off information architecture received from the server

Records and Updates the server on the experimental data

Understanding about the usability and usability testing of applications and information architectures.
